about.heading: About me
about.1.1: Hello, my name is Javier, I live in Seville and I am a web developer with studies in Web Application Development and Multiplatform Application Development. I specialize in
about.1.2: , but I have also used backend technologies and software development in Java.
about.2: I am a Law graduate, but several years ago I changed my career to dedicate myself exclusively to web development.
about.3: If you are interested in working with me, you can contact me by email, phone or through any of my social networks.
